summary: Internal FBI email chain from September 2019 regarding the preparation of a victim notification list for the Epstein case. The emails discuss confirming attorney representation for victims, verifying contact information, and finalizing the list for distribution by the FBI's Victim Services Division.

persons.name: Spencer Kuvin
persons.context: Attorney mentioned as representing a victim; FBI agents were waiting for his callback to confirm representation details.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Attorney representing multiple victims on the notification list; her email address was noted for correspondence.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Attorney representing multiple victims; his firm was contacted by the FBI, and his email address was used for notifications.

persons.name: Robert Glassman
persons.context: Attorney representing a victim; the FBI noted a lack of email address for him, planning to contact the victim directly.

persons.name: Robert Josefsberg
persons.context: Attorney representing multiple victims; included in the attorney reference list for victim notifications.

persons.name: Kimberly Lerner
persons.context: Attorney listed in the victim notification reference list.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Attorney listed multiple times in the victim notification reference list.

persons.name: Colleen Mullen
persons.context: Attorney listed in the victim notification reference list.

persons.name: Jack Scarola
persons.context: Attorney representing a victim; his contact information was updated in the list.

persons.name: Jeffrey Herman
persons.context: Attorney inquired about but confirmed not to be representing any victims on this list.

persons.name: Rita Glavin
persons.context: Attorney listed in a query for email addresses; part of the attorney reference list.

persons.name: Adam Horowitz
persons.context: Attorney listed in a query for email addresses, possibly associated with Jeffrey Herman.

persons.name: Alexandra Marina Conlon
persons.context: Victim listed on the notification list; name appears in the victim name column.

connections.description: Gloria Allred is listed as the attorney representing multiple victims on the FBI notification list.
Brad Edwards is listed as the attorney for multiple victims, and his firm was contacted by the FBI regarding representation.
Robert Josefsberg is listed as the attorney representing multiple victims on the notification list.
The FBI unit is coordinating with multiple attorneys to notify victims about the Epstein case, as shown in the email chain.

events.title: Finalization of Epstein Victim Notification List
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division agents finalize a list of Epstein victims and their attorneys for case notification emails, resolving representation details and contact information.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively preparing to notify victims of Jeffrey Epstein about case developments in September 2019.
The document reveals a list of attorneys representing Epstein victims, including Gloria Allred, Brad Edwards, and Robert Josefsberg, indicating organized legal representation for multiple victims.
Internal FBI discussions show challenges in verifying attorney contact information and determining notification protocols for victims with multiple attorneys or no email addresses.
A deceased victim was noted, with the FBI considering notifying next of kin (NOK) as they would be entitled to case information.
The email chain highlights procedural coordination between FBI field offices and the Victim Services Division to ensure accurate victim outreach.
